methodologies.title: Project-Based Learning
methodologies.description: Follow the 7P model: Phenomenon, Problem, Plan, Prototype, Product, Presentation, Price to develop critical skills.

methodologies.title: Cohort Accountability
methodologies.description: Shared start/end dates, peer-to-peer accountability, and structured progress tracking to improve outcomes.

methodologies.title: Progressive Skill Building
methodologies.description: From foundational concepts to launch preparation, supporting different learning speeds.

methodologies.title: Reverse Learning
methodologies.description: Study materials are provided before sessions, allowing class time to focus on reflection, deeper discussion, and practical application.

steps.title: Learning Materials
steps.description: Students receive comprehensive learning materials at the start of each day, including tutorials, examples, and reference guides.

steps.title: Applied Practice
steps.description: Students apply the concepts to their individual projects with access to instructor assistance and real-time guidance.

steps.title: Guided Peer Discussion
steps.description: Sessions end with facilitated group discussions where participants share challenges, solutions, and insights from their day's progress.
